cleaned_text: Homeopathy Homeopathy is a safe, gentle, natural approach to health and healing. It works with your body to relieve symptoms, restore itself and improve your overall health. Homeopathy is ... - extremely safe to use, even with small children, - entirely free of the side effects of modern medications, - made exclusively from natural substances, - recognized by World Health Organization as the second largest therapeutic system in the world, - regulated by the FDA, and - very affordable. Our wellness specialists recommend "Heel" and "Guna" homeopathic products for internal use in the form of small pills and drops. We tailor your treatment in homeopathy to your individual needs, selecting remedies according to a total picture, including not only your symptoms, but also your lifestyle, mental state and emotional disposition.
